definition: Youhao district of Yichun city 伊春市[Yi1 chun1 shi4], Heilongjiang
good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello
to be fond of/to have a tendency to/to be prone to
Youhao district of Yichun city 伊春市[Yi1 chun1 shi4], Heilongjiang
Chinese People's Association for Friendship with Foreign Countries (CPAFFC)
pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Ren2 min2 Dui4 wai4 You3 hao3 Xie2 hui4
containing_words.word: 中國人民對外友好協會

sentences.english: anywhere you want to go,  there's always somebody friendly.
sentences.chinese: 無論你想去哪兒，都會有些友好的人。

sentences.english: The atmosphere in the early hours of Tuesday's anti-government rally was friendly.
sentences.chinese: 在週二的反政府集會凌晨氣氛友好。

sentences.english: 4I love place where the people are really friendly.
sentences.chinese: 我喜愛人們會很友好的地方。

sentences.english: In the holiday between the relatives and friends mutually congratulates , the gift, the expression is mutually friendly.
sentences.chinese: 節日裏親友之間相互祝賀，互贈禮品，表示友好。

sentences.english: Many of our picks also share Tinley Park's family-friendly atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 很多我們的推薦也同樣有家庭友好的氣氛。

sentences.english: It seemed more new-user-friendly that way.
sentences.chinese: 這看起來對新用戶來說更爲友好。

sentences.english: The Treaty of Amity and Cooperation in Southeast Asia is a good lesson for them.
sentences.chinese: 東南亞國家的友好合作條約爲他們建立了一個好榜樣。

sentences.english: Many techie toys are wallet-friendly at under $30.
sentences.chinese: 許多技術人員的玩具錢包友好在30美元以下。

sentences.english: Hu said China and Mongolia are friendly neighbors.
sentences.chinese: 胡錦濤說，中蒙兩國是山水相連的友好鄰邦。

sentences.english: The government's refusal was couched in unfriendly language.
sentences.chinese: 該政府以不友好的語言予以拒絕。

sentences.english: Next year has been designated as the Year of China-Pakistan Friendship. A number of exchange activities will be held.
sentences.chinese: 明年是“中巴友好年”，雙方將舉辦一系列交流活動。

sentences.english: The Chinese side would like to work together with Arab states to compose a new chapter of China-Arab friendly cooperation.
sentences.chinese: 中方願與阿方共同努力，譜寫中阿友好合作的新篇章。

sentences.english: Teach your child to be kind to the earth.
sentences.chinese: 教育你的孩子友好的對待地球。

sentences.english: I think Europ is special and people is not so friendly.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲歐洲很特別而且人們也不太友好。

sentences.english: I was obliged to confess, and in recompense for my cowardice and inhumanity was sent out of the house.
sentences.chinese: 作爲對我的懦弱和不友好的賞罰，我被趕出了房子。

sentences.english: Yangzhou was a port of friendly foreign exchanges.
sentences.chinese: 揚州也是中外友好往來的港口。

definition: harmonious/friendly relations/on good terms with one another
to greet sb by word or action/to give prior notice
Heping district of Shenyang city 瀋陽市|沈阳市, Liaoning/Hoping township in Taichung county 臺中縣|台中县[Tai2 zhong1 xian4], Taiwan
